dfstools 1.1.0.9999
  • Reference

NBA Archetype Search

Source: R/nba_analytics.R
nba_archetype_search.Rd

stepwise search of archetype counts

nba_archetype_search(player_totals, num_steps = 1:7, nrep = 32, verbose = TRUE)

Arguments

player_totals

a tibble returned by nba_player_season_totals
num_steps

number of steps to use (default 1:5)
nrep

number of repetitions at each step (default 4)
verbose

should the search be verbose? (default TRUE)

Value

a list of

  • archetype_parameters the parameters that define each archetype

  • player_alphas the players tagged with their loadings on each archetype

  • archetype_model the model object - the bestModel with num_steps archetypes

  • all of the models

Examples

if (FALSE) {
dfstools::msf_set_apikey("your MySportsFeeds API key")
player_totals <- dfstools::nba_player_season_totals("2018-2019-regular")
the_archetypes <- dfstools::nba_archetype_search(player_totals$player_totals)
screeplot(the_archetypes$archetype_models)
player_alphas <- the_archetypes[["player_alphas"]]
View(player_alphas)
}
